case.get_case: Read all case fields specified in the role
case.update_case: Update all case fields specified in the role

convos.list_comments: Get all comments for a conversation
convos.modify_comment: Update a comment on a conversation
convos.delete_comment: Delete a comment on a conversation

posts.list_comments: Get all comments for a post
posts.modify_comment: Update a comment on a post
posts.delete_comment: Delete a comment on a post

signs.list_comments: Get all comments for a sign
signs.modify_comment: Update a comment on a sign
signs.delete_comment: Delete a comment on a sign

tasks.list_comments: Get all comments for a task
tasks.modify_comment: Update a comment on a task
tasks.delete_comment: Delete a comment on a task
tasks.modify_response: Update the status of a task

subtasks.list_comments: Get all comments for a subtask
subtasks.modify_comment: Update a comment on a subtask
subtasks.delete_comment: Delete a comment on a subtask
subtasks.modify_response: Update the status of a subtask
